name: InstanceSegmentation
description: Inference engine results for instance segmentation model. The flowId is expected to be in the form of <stream id>.<engine id>.

tags.name: frame_id
tags.description: ID of the input video frame fed to the inference engine

tags.name: model_id
tags.description: AI model identifier associated with the result

tags.name: segmentation_masks
tags.description: List of segmentation masks (the results)

tags.name: width
tags.description: Segmentation mask width

tags.name: height
tags.description: Segmentation mask height

tags.name: encoding
tags.description: Encoding scheme used for segmentation mask

tags.name: size
tags.description: Segmentation mask payload size (bytes)

tags.name: offset_x
tags.description: X axis offset of mask within frame (pixels from 0,0)

tags.name: offset_y
tags.description: Y axis offset of mask within frame (pixels from 0,0)

tags.name: frame_data
tags.description: Segmentation mask frame data

tags.name: instances
tags.description: List of instances associated with this segmentation mask

tags.name: inference_id
tags.description: Unique inference identifier

tags.name: parent_inference_id
tags.description: Identifier referencing a parent inference node or result

tags.name: super_category_id
tags.description: Super category/class ID

tags.name: super_category_label
tags.description: Human interpreted super category name

tags.name: category_id
tags.description: Classification category/class ID

tags.name: category_label
tags.description: Human interpreted category name

tags.name: x1
tags.description: Top left X coordinate of bounding box within mask (% from 0,0)

tags.name: y1
tags.description: Top left Y coordinate of bounding box within mask (% from 0,0)

tags.name: x2
tags.description: Bottom right X coordinate of bounding box within mask (% from 0,0)

tags.name: y2
tags.description: Bottom right Y coordinate of bounding box within mask (% from 0,0)

tags.name: color
tags.description: Color associated with this category
